Test Case: Verify that all the fields such as Username/Email and Password and have a valid placeholder.
Test Step: 1. Check all the place holder from all the fields
Expected Result: There should be place holder on every field.

Test Case: Verify that all the required/mandatory fields are marked with * against the field.
Test Step: 1. Check the * on the mandatory field
Expected Result: There should be * on the mandatory fields.

Test Case: Verify that system generates a validation message when clicking on "Login" button without filling all the mandatory fields.
Test Step: 1. Click on "Login" button without filling all the fields
Expected Result: An alert message should show up. The message is based on the business requirement.

Test Case: Verify that User is able to login with a valid Username and password.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with a valid username and password
2. Click on "Login" button

Test Case: Verify that User is able to login by clicking the "Enter" key as substitute for "Login" button.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with a valid username and password
2. Click on "Enter" button

Test Case: Verify that system generates a validation message when entering an incorrect email/User ID.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with an incorrect username
2. Click on "Login" button
Expected Result: User will be unable to login. An alert message should show up (the message is based on the business requirement.).

Test Case: Verify that system generates a validation message when entering an incorrect password.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with an incorrect password
2. Click on "Login" button
Expected Result: User will be unable to login. An alert message should show up (the message is based on the business requirement).

Test Case: Verify the Username and password limit when entering the Username and password less than minimum characters.
Test Step: 1. Fill in the username and password field with less than minimum characters
Expected Result: An alert message should show up. The message is based on the business requirement.

Test Case: Verify the Username and password limit when entering the Username and password greater than maximum characters.
Test Step: 1. Fill in the username and password field with less than maximum characters
Expected Result: An alert message should show up. The message is based on the business requirement.

Test Case: Verify that the password is in encrypted form when it is entered.
Test Step: 1. Verify that the password is encrypted

Test Case: Verify that the "Forgot password" button is working.
Expected Result: It will be redirected to the "Forgot password" page.

Test Case: Verify that the email of "Forgot password" link is successfully sent.
Test Step:
1. Click on the "Forgot password" button
2. Fill in the email field to send the reset link

Test Case: Verify that User is unable to login by using the old password after User reset to the new password.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with a valid username and old password
2. Click on "Login" button
Expected Result: User will be unable to login. An alert message should show up (the message is based on the business requirement.).

Test Case: Verify that User is able to login by using new password.
Test Step:
1. Fill in the username and password field with a valid username and new password
2. Click on "Login" button

Test Case: Verify that clicking on the browser "Close" button after successful login will not take the User to logout.
Pre-Condition: User is on the "Home" Page after successfully logging in
Test Step: 1. Click on "Close" button on the browser

Test Case: Verify that clicking on the browser "Back" button after successful login will not take the User to logout.
Pre-Condition: User is on the "Home" Page after successfully logging in
Test Step: 1. Click on "Back" button on the browser
